articles.title: Dennis Cometti doubts West Coast can make the top eight after loss to Essendon - PerthNow
articles.description: Legendary commentator Dennis Cometti says alarm bells should be ringing at the Eagles after the shock 16-point loss to Essendon at Optus Stadium.
articles.content:
Legendary commentator Dennis Cometti says West Coast arent a strong side anymore and fears the club will miss finals altogether in 2021.

articles.title: ‘They know you haven’t won a game’: Newsome reveals toll of Tahs’ season - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Waratahs winger Alex Newsome pulled no punches when outlining the impact the Waratahs’ fruitless campaign has had on the NSW players.
articles.content:
The Tahs have conceded almost 42 points per game through 11 matches this season.
Against their three New Zealand opponents in trans-Tasman Super Rugby, they have conceded 64, 48 and 54 points.
